snippet: The $950 million deal will give the buyout firm an opportunity to resuscitate a declining operation.
abstract: The $950 million deal will give the buyout firm an opportunity to resuscitate a declining operation.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: AT&T Sells Majority Stake in Yellow Pages to Cerberus
headline.print_headline: AT&T Sells Majority Stake In Yellow Pages
